Class SimplifyingGeometryProcessor

  • java.lang.Object

      • edu.colorado.cires.cmg.hullgen.SimplifyingGeometryProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeometryProcessor

    public class SimplifyingGeometryProcessor
extends BaseGeometryProcessor
    Implementation of BaseGeometryProcessor which simplifies output geometry

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimplifyingGeometryProcessor

        public SimplifyingGeometryProcessor(Integer h3Resolution,
                                    org.locationtech.jts.geom.GeometryFactory geometryFactory,
                                    double distanceTolerance,
                                    double deltaDistanceTolerance,
                                    double maxGeometryPointsAllowed)
                             throws IOException
        Parameters:
        h3Resolution - integer from 0 (the lowest resolution) to 15 (the highest resolution) specifying size of H3 hexagons
        geometryFactory - GeometryFactory for generating and merging JTS geometries
        distanceTolerance - Douglas-Peucker algorithm distance tolerance
        deltaDistanceTolerance - Granularity of change in distance tolerance for successive attempts of Douglas-Peucker algorithm
        maxGeometryPointsAllowed - maximum allowed points allowed in output Geometry
        Throws:
        IOException - if H3Core cannot create a new instance

    • Method Detail

      • getGeometryOutlines

        public List<org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry> getGeometryOutlines(Collection<Long> points)
        Transforms H3 ids into a simplified List containing outer rings. Applies Douglas-Peucker algorithm to outer rings
        Specified by:
        getGeometryOutlines in interface GeometryProcessor
        Overrides:
        getGeometryOutlines in class BaseGeometryProcessor
        Parameters:
        points - Collection containing H3 ids
        Returns:
        List containing outer rings of neighboring hexagons

      • mergeGeometryOutlines

        public org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry mergeGeometryOutlines(List<org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry> geometries,
                                                                org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry existingGeometry)
        Unions List into a single Geometry. Successively applies Douglas-Peucker algorithm until output geometry is at or below the specified point count
        Specified by:
        mergeGeometryOutlines in interface GeometryProcessor
        Overrides:
        mergeGeometryOutlines in class BaseGeometryProcessor
        Parameters:
        geometries - List separated geometries
        existingGeometry - Geometry existing geometry
        Returns:
        Geometry containing unions of all input geometry
